tool_description:
Extract structured text and portraits from various ID cards, passports, driver's licenses, etc. Support for 200+ countries and regions and 10,000+ document types.
It can also recognize MRZ and QR/BarCodes.
name: Document OCR
title: Document OCR

api_list.name: Document OCR
api_list.description: Not limited to some examples shown in the document.

optional_parameters.name: inputurl
optional_parameters.description: Please choose one of the parameters, either "inputurl" or "inputimage". If you choose "inputurl", please enter a valid URL starting with "http(s)://" or a base64 string. For example, you can enter "https://www.netherlandsworldwide.nl/binaries/content/gallery/platform-1government/afbeeldingen/passport-2011-front-citizen-service-number.jpg" as an inputurl or "data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGg...." as a base64 string for the inputimage parameter.
